media.headline: Peralta gets Gonzalez looking
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Peralta catches Gonzalez looking
media.bigblurb: Wily Peralta strikes out Carlos Gonzalez with a fastball on the outside corner to end the top of the 1st

media.headline: Chatwood's pickoff nabs Villar
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Chatwood picks off Villar at 1st
media.bigblurb: Tyler Chatwood throws over to first base to pick off Jonathan Villar as he attemps to steal second

media.headline: Pina throws out Parra at second
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Pina catches Parra stealing
media.bigblurb: Manny Pina throws down to second base and catches Gerardo Parra attempting to steal for the final out in the top of the 2nd

media.headline: Gonzalez throws out Arcia
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Gonzalez throws out Arcia at plate for DP
media.bigblurb: Carlos Gonzalez ranges in to snag a line drive then throws out Orlando Arcia at home plate to end the 3rd inning

media.headline: Arcia's triple to left-center
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Arcia rips triple in 3rd
media.bigblurb: Orlando Arcia rips a line drive triple to left-center in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Thames' solo home run
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Thames crushes solo homer to right
media.bigblurb: Eric Thames crushes a solo home run deep over the right-field wall, giving the Brewers a 1-0 lead in the 4th inning

media.headline: Shaw's deep homer to right
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Shaw launches solo homer to right
media.bigblurb: Travis Shaw launches a two-run home run, scoring Ryan Braun, to give the Brewers a 3-0 lead in the 4th inning

media.headline: Brewers turn two
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Villar starts inning-ending double play
media.bigblurb: Jonathan Villar fields a ground ball from Nolan Arenado and flips to Orlando Arcia to start a double play to end the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Perez's RBI double to center
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Perez grounds RBI double to center
media.bigblurb: Hernan Perez grounds an RBI double to center field, driving in Ryan Braun to give the Brewers a 4-0 lead in the 6th inning

media.headline: Chatwood's pickoff ends 6th
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Chatwood picks off Perez at second
media.bigblurb: Tyler Chatwood makes a quick move to second base to pick off Hernan Perez for the final out of the 6th inning

media.headline: Villar's two-run home run
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Villar lines two-run homer to left
media.bigblurb: Jonathan Villar lines a two-run home run over the right-field wall in the 8th inning, giving the Brewers a 6-0 lead

media.headline: Reynolds' RBI single to left
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Reynolds grounds an RBI single
media.bigblurb: Mark Reynolds grounds an RBI single to left field, driving in Trevor Story in the 9th inning, making the score 6-1

media.headline: Thames' homer gets a Korean call
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Thames' home run gets Korean call
media.bigblurb: The Brewers' TV crew gives former KBO star Eric Thames' first MLB homer a Korean call to ease his transition back into the Major Leagues

media.headline: Peralta's scoreless start
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Peralta fans five over five scoreless frames
media.bigblurb: Wily Peralta strikes out five over five shutout innings, allowing just three hits and a walk in the Brewers win over the Rockies

media.headline: Counsell on win over Rockies
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Counsell on Peralta in win
media.bigblurb: Brewers manager Craig Counsell discusses a nice start for Wily Peralta in a win over the Rockies

media.headline: Chatwood's 1st-inning K
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Chatwood strikes out Thames
media.bigblurb: Tyler Chatwood strikes out Eric Thames in the 1st inning

media.headline: Black on loss to Brewers
media.blurb: COL@MIL Black on Chatwood, loss
media.bigblurb: Rockies manager Bud Black discusses Tyler Chatwood's start and his hitters looking off-balance in a loss to the Brewers

media.headline: Thames on homer, Brewers' win
media.blurb: Eric Thames discusses his first MLB HR since 2012
media.bigblurb: Eric Thames talks about his first MLB home run since 2012 in the Brewers' 6-1 win over Colorado

media.headline: Recap: MIL 6, COL 1
media.blurb: 4/5/17: Thames, Shaw lead Brewers to 6-1 win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Eric Thames, Jonathan Villar and Travis Shaw all homered, to lead the Brewers to a 6-1 win over the Rockies

media.headline: 4/5/17 CG: COL@MIL
media.blurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: COL@MIL
media.bigblurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: COL@MIL
